mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, meal_name, meal_time, photo_path, memo, total_calorie, protein_g, fat_g, carbohydrate_g, fiber_g, salt_g, cholesterol_mg, created FROM meal_posts WHERE deleted = FALSE
SELECT * FROM meal_posts WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meal_posts ( user_id, meal_name, meal_time, photo_path, memo, total_calorie, protein_g, fat_g, carbohydrate_g, fiber_g, salt_g, cholesterol_mg, created ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{mealName}, #{mealTime}, #{photoPath}, #{memo}, #{totalCalorie}, #{proteinG}, #{fatG}, #{carbohydrateG}, #{fiberG}, #{saltG}, #{cholesterolMg}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE meal_posts SET user_id = #{userId}, meal_name = #{mealName}, meal_time = #{mealTime}, photo_path = #{photoPath}, memo = #{memo}, total_calorie = #{totalCalorie}, protein_g = #{proteinG}, fat_g = #{fatG}, carbohydrate_g = #{carbohydrateG}, fiber_g = #{fiberG}, salt_g = #{saltG}, cholesterol_mg = #{cholesterolMg} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE meal_posts SET deleted = true WHERE id = #{id}
